title: Mindfulness Bootcamp - LGBTQ Affirmative Classical Mindfulness-Based Skills Practice
desc: Whether you have been meditating for years or you are interested finding new ways to relieve the stresses of everyday life, this newly revamped workshop gives you the opportunity to learn and practice effective classical mindfulness-based meditation techniques and introductory tai chi. Following these exercises, you will discuss these practices and their relevance with your classmates in an LGBTQ affirmative setting. The mindfulness practices you will learn in this monthly workshop can support you in becoming more aware, attentive, focused, present, and mentally clear. These benefits can be applied to managing stress and anxiety, building internal calm and safety, and nourishing your well-being. Boot up your brain, heart and chi (energy) in a safe and comfortable LGBTQ affirming space! Instructor:  Matthew Silverstein, PhD, LMFT ? Course Meeting Schedule: Sat. Feb. 20 Course Meeting Times: 2:30 - 4 p.m.
